title: Autumn Movie Release Preview - Joker, Gladiator, Paddington and more - with Ella Kemp
content: The not so good news: summer is starting the wrap up. You know, with the wind and the rain and the going back to school of it all... but! If you're a film fan, there are many reasons to be cheerful, with the next few months promising some VERY BIG and VERY EXCITING films, including some massive blockbuster sequels in the form of Paddington 3, Gladiator 2 and Joker Folie A Deux (to name but three) as well as indier, artier fare such as Nosferatu and Anora. Joining Ali to hop, skip and jump through just some of the movies worth looking forward to is Letterboxd's very own Ella Kemp, friend of the show and film festival fancier, who has all the info you need on those slightly under-the-radar films worth looking out for.
